jurisdiction.name: Texas
jurisdiction.notes: Texas maintains its own TEKS standards and did not adopt NGSS. The Texas Education Agency (TEA) publishes TEKS in CASE format. Science TEKS updated 2024. Notable for explicit inclusion of evolution alongside discussion of its limitations.

jurisdiction.name: Wyoming
jurisdiction.notes: Wyoming adopted modified NGSS in 2016 but removed all references to human-caused climate change following political pressure. Restored climate language in 2020 revision. Illustrates political contestation of science standards.
